creator: jayantam725

title: Weird Borders in websites and address bar not searching.
content:
Every website I go to except for some like settings or customize toolbar has these weird borders that are the same as my theme that just appeared and I don't know how to turn them off.

Also my address bar will only go to a direct website I put in. Like if I try to search for banana, it'll instead be https://banana/ instead of my search engine so I can't search.
creator: pijun

title: Drop down menu will not stay open
content: Need help on how to fix this issue. Can not drop down the menu above this box as it closes again right away.
creator: mrveatch58

title: Show "Manage History" as default instead of sidebar
content:
When i press Ctrl+H, i get the history sidebar. I'd like to exchange this for the "Manage History" window instead.

I know there's the Ctrl+Shift+H shortcut but it annoys me to press yet another key to get this.
creator: liegemarcins

title: Offidocs
content: I've set Downloads, particularly pdfs to open with Acrobat but no matter what I do Offidocs starts. After a long countdown I get a message box that says in essence don't use Offidocs but I can't get rid of it. Please help!!!
creator: Michaelsart

title: css. devPixelsPerPx for 200 DPI?
content: My DPI on my laptop running Windows 11 is set to 200% on an external display, and Firefox detects this, and adjusts every webpage accordingly. Text is very fuzzy. What do you suggest I change css. devPixelsPerPx to? Thank you
creator: vistaval91355

title: How I can safely remove the “SaveFrom.net Helper” bookmark tab which has high jacked my Firefox Bookmarks.
content:
Unfortunately, I downloaded “SaveFrom.net Helper” without reviewing it.

Since downloading it I have been receiving a alerts from “McAfee WebAdvisor” about “dangerous pages blocked”.

I was able to remove the “SaveFrom.net Helper” add on in Firefox, but am unable to remove the “Savefrom.net Helper” bookmark tab which has high jacked my normal Firefox Bookmarks.

I can no longer easily see my Firefox Bookmarks and have to keep opening the Firefox Application Menu, then select Bookmarks, then select Manage Bookmarks in order to see my bookmarks.

Can you please advise how I can safely remove the “SaveFrom.net Helper” bookmark tab which has high jacked my Firefox Bookmarks.
creator: Philip47
